solution_line_template: One lap corresponds to the perimeter of a rectangle of {field_length} m length and {field_width} m width: {perimeter_factor}*{field_length} + {perimeter_factor} *{field_width} = <<{perimeter_factor}*{field_length}+{perimeter_factor}*{field_width}={distance_per_lap}>>{distance_per_lap} metres.
Each player has to do {num_laps} turns of the field, so runs {num_laps}*{distance_per_lap} = <<{num_laps}*{distance_per_lap}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} meters.
